duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare project scope, and Request for Proposals/Qualifications (RFP/Qs)
Review project specifications, and engineering designs
Implement the planning, design, construction, and closeout phases of public works capital improvement engineering projects
Negotiate, administer, and manage consultant services such as design, construction management, inspection, and other specialty services
Monitor and evaluate construction work in progress to ensure compliance with approved plans, specifications, and material standards
Provide support by performing calculations and plan check reviews for construction activities

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university in Civil Engineering
